title: Emirates Drops Economy Award Pricing By Up to 55%, Decreases Mileage Earnings
description: Emirates just quietly implemented two changes to its Skywards frequent flyer program. Effective June 1, 2024, Emirates trimmed the mileage earning rates for economy and premium economy passengers while simultaneously slashing economy award prices. You can now fly Emirates from US to Europe for 17,500 miles with affordable taxes/fees! Here’s what you need to know about the Emirates Skywards changes.

tags.name: Earning Strategy
tags.description: Learn how to earn more points from your spending, travel, and other promotions.

tags.name: Using Points
tags.description: Find posts covering every aspect of turning your hard-earned points into travel.

title: Emirates Slashes Partner Economy Award Pricing by up to 20%
description: This past weekend, Emirates quietly cut the mileage requirement for economy awards on flights it operates by up to 55%. But the airline didn’t stop there. Economy award pricing on its partner carriers also got a haircut. Here’s what you need to know about these changes, including a look at the partners now requiring fewer Skywards miles.

title: Fiji Airways Set To Become 15th Oneworld Member. Here's We Know So Far.
description: Everyone saw this coming, but we just didn’t have a specific timeline. However, the rumors were confirmed at the annual IATA conference in Dubai when Oneworld CEO Nathaniel Pieper announced that Fiji Airways would become the 15th member of the alliance. The coinciding press release provides details to answer some of our most pressing questions, but there’s also a lot we don’t know at this point. From the timeline to elite benefits and earning rates, let’s separate the knowns from the unknowns as Fiji Airways moves from the sole “Oneworld Connect” member to a full-fledged member of the alliance.

tags.name: Oneworld
tags.description: Oneworld is a global airline alliance that includes American Airlines, Alaska Airlines, British Airways, Cathay Pacific, Finnair, and Japan Airlines.

tags.name: Partners & Alliances
tags.description: With most points and miles, you have far more options than you imagine. Learn how to leverage partnerships and alliances to build the perfect trip.

title: Check Your Barclays Aviator Card for a Bonus Miles Offer
description: Got a Barclays-issued American Airlines credit card? If so, check your offers, as you might have a spending-based offer to earn 2,000 bonus miles on your card. This is a targeted offer, so not everyone will have it. If you do, however, this could be a nice way to pad your AAdvantage® balance this summer.

tags.name: Deals & Promos
tags.description: Stay up to date on the latest limited-time deals and promotions to earn more points and save on travel.

title: Earn 4X Rewards This Summer With Your American Express Debit Card
description: American Express just announced a promotion offering Rewards Checking debit card holders 4X their normal Membership Rewards points on purchases through July 31, 2024. Whether you’ve got a qualifying account or are interested in learning more during this great promotion, here’s everything you need to know.

tags.name: Deals & Promos
tags.description: Stay up to date on the latest limited-time deals and promotions to earn more points and save on travel.

title: You Can Now Book American Airlines Flights With Asia Miles Online
description: You might be familiar with Cathay Pacific’s infamous flight award request form. It’s the digital document you have to fill out to book Asia Miles awards on a handful of Cathay’s partners that don’t show up in online searches. American Airlines was one of the partner airlines that required this form. Those days are gone; you can now book American Airlines awards with Asia Miles online.

tags.name: Cathay Pacific (Asia Miles)
tags.description: Asia Miles is the loyalty program for Cathay Pacific. Read news, guides, sweet spots, and more about Cathay Pacific Asia Miles mileage program.

tags.name: Using Points
tags.description: Find posts covering every aspect of turning your hard-earned points into travel.

title: Alaska Airlines Giving Free Upgrades Throughout Summer 2024
description: This summer, Alaska Airlines is selecting one random passenger per day to upgrade to Premium Class, giving them more legroom, drinks, and priority boarding. Here are the details of this promotion, plus how to find out if you’ve been selected.

tags.name: Deals & Promos
tags.description: Stay up to date on the latest limited-time deals and promotions to earn more points and save on travel.

title: Earn Delta SkyMiles at Starbucks, Plus Increased Earning Rates on Reloads
description: Delta and Starbucks have a loyalty partnership that lets you earn SkyMiles on purchases at Starbucks. You will also earn double Starbucks stars on days you make a purchase and have a scheduled Delta flight. The partnership offers more than earnings, with a few new benefits and an exciting welcome bonus. Plus, new changes incentivize reloading your Starbucks card with higher amounts by providing extra Delta SkyMiles as the balance increases.

tags.name: Deals & Promos
tags.description: Stay up to date on the latest limited-time deals and promotions to earn more points and save on travel.

title: High Swipe Fees Force eBay To Cut Ties With American Express — What It Means for You
description: eBay has had enough — or so it seems based on the e-commerce company’s scathing statement issued this morning. The swipe fees it incurs every time you charge an eBay purchase to your American Express credit card are too much to bear, according to the platform. And as a result, eBay is cracking down on what cards you can and can’t use to shop its website. Here’s what eBay users need to know.

tags.name: Earning Strategy
tags.description: Learn how to earn more points from your spending, travel, and other promotions.

title: Hyatt Releases Further Details on Hyatt Studios: First Locations, Brand Explorer & Reduced Earnings
description: Hyatt Studios is the newest hotel brand to join the ranks of other extended-stay properties, with the first built-from-scratch locations originally scheduled to open by the end of 2024. However, that date has been pushed back, though other updates on Hyatt Studios include some positives and negatives, as well as details on the first two locations of this new brand and how it will participate in the World of Hyatt program.

title: Alaska Airlines Adds 32nd Partner: Aleutian Airways
description: Alaska Airlines did it again. It partnered with an airline you’ve likely never heard of: Aleutian Airways. And like its now-second-newest boutique partner (Contour), there’s a compelling reason to fly with Aleutian. The small, Saab-powered carrier can take you to places in Alaska that Alaska Airlines doesn’t. Here’s what you need to know about Alaska’s newest earn-only partner, Aleutian Airways.

tags.name: Partners & Alliances
tags.description: With most points and miles, you have far more options than you imagine. Learn how to leverage partnerships and alliances to build the perfect trip.

title: You Can Now Earn and Redeem Flying Blue Miles on Oman Air...Which Is Surprising
description: Mere days after confirming the timeline for Oman Air joining Oneworld, which should happen by the end of 2024, Oneworld’s next airline has gone and partnered with founding members of the rival SkyTeam alliance. That’s interesting, to say the least. That’s good news for those who love additional options for earning and redeeming their miles, though. And the fact the partnership comes with one of the easiest programs in which to accrue miles should make you especially happy.

tags.name: Partners & Alliances
tags.description: With most points and miles, you have far more options than you imagine. Learn how to leverage partnerships and alliances to build the perfect trip.

title: Enjoy Perks and Savings at These Concerts and Stadiums With Your Amex Card
description: At select venues throughout the United States and worldwide, you can enjoy unique benefits — all because of your American Express credit card. These perks include savings on concessions, special ticket access, and dedicated entrances and fast lanes just for you. Here’s what you need to know about the Amex Venue Collection.

tags.name: Card Benefits
tags.description: Rewards cards aren't just for earning points and miles. Learn how to take advantage of valuable perks like elite status, lounge access, discounts and rebates, free hotel nights, travel insurance and purchase protection. Armed with the right knowledge, you'll get far more value than the cost of your rewards cards.

title: PointsYeah One-Year Anniversary Sale: 30% Off First-Year Membership
description: PointsYeah is offering 30% off Premium subscriptions to new members to celebrate its one-year anniversary. Sign up by 11:59 pm Pacific on June 30, 2024 to take advantage of fantastic first-year pricing. Here are the full details of the promotion and the promo code to use to save 30%.

tags.name: Deals & Promos
tags.description: Stay up to date on the latest limited-time deals and promotions to earn more points and save on travel.

title: CLEAR Plus Members: Activate a Free Year of FoundersCard Membership
description: It’s not every day that I check my email and find a free one-year trial of something that normally costs a few hundred dollars. But that’s the magic happening today. CLEAR Plus members are receiving emails to activate a free one-year trial membership for FoundersCard, the travel-meets-business luxury card that normally carries a steep membership fee. What is FoundersCard, and how do you enroll for the free 12 months of it? Read on.

tags.name: Deals & Promos
tags.description: Stay up to date on the latest limited-time deals and promotions to earn more points and save on travel.

title: Earn 2,000 Bonus SkyMiles From the Delta and Turo Partnership
description: In 2022, Delta added Turo as another car rental partner. Since then, new members have been able to receive bonus miles when linking accounts and completing one Turo rental. If you’ve never rented from Turo, you can join now, link your accounts, and get 2,000 SkyMiles, plus 500 bonus miles on subsequent rentals. Here are the details.

title: SIXT Promotions Offer Up to 15X Miles During the Euro 2024 Tournament
description: In celebration of Euro 2024 (the biggest European soccer tournament among national teams), SIXT has several promotions giving members up to 15X miles on rentals through July 31, 2024. You’ll need to choose which airline to earn bonus miles with and book your rental by June 30. Here are the details of these promotions.

tags.description: Sixt loyalty card gives you discounted rentals, free additional drivers free car category upgrades, regular offers via email, and the chance to earn status.

title: Brand-New Capital One Lounge Coming to New York’s JFK Airport
description: The lounge game has been heating up for a while. Issuers with premium rewards card products are carving out space in airports seemingly left and right. Capital One is just the latest to announce a new offering, with its newest outpost coming to New York’s John F. Kennedy International Airport at some point in the future. Here’s everything we know so far about JFK’s Capital One Lounge, including what you can expect when you walk through the doors.

title: Now Live: U.S. Bank Bonus Days Offers Double Points on Online Shopping & Travel Portal June 12–14
description: For the third time this year, U.S. Bank Double Bonus Days are back. From June 12 to 14, 2024, eligible cardholders can earn double points on all purchases made in the U.S. Bank Shopping Deals platform and in the Travel Rewards Center — potentially the most lucrative part of the offer. We see this promotion every few months, although the offers’ terms vary. Here are the details on the current iteration.

title: How To Find 0% Promotional APR Offers on Discover Cards (and Why You Might Want To Avoid Them)
description: Holding a credit card with a 0% introductory or promotional APR is handy in the right circumstances. And if you have a Discover Card, reaching out to the issuer might be worth your time; you may be able to activate a targeted 0% promotional APR offer for the next several months or even a year, based on offers several cardholders have received.

tags.description: Discover is well-known for its cash-back credit cards with no annual fees. But, Discover bank offers many other cards and services.

title: Last Call: Transfer Chase Ultimate Rewards to Virgin Atlantic Flying Club With a 30% Bonus
description: Chase Ultimate Rewards currently has a 30% transfer bonus to Virgin Atlantic Flying Club, but it’s ending on June 15, 2024. Until then, Chase cardholders will receive 1,300 Virgin points for every 1,000 Ultimate Rewards points you transfer. Here are examples of ways to maximize this transfer bonus — including sweet spots within the U.S. (from 6k Chase points each way) to the Bahamas (from 9k points each way), Europe (business class for 39k points each way), and Japan (business class from 35k points each way).

tags.name: Buy & Transfer Bonuses
tags.description: Reduce the cost of travel by taking advantage of transfer bonuses and buying points and miles at a discount. Check back often for new deals and promotions.

title: Hilton and Small Luxury Hotels Partnership Now Live. Here Are the Properties and Benefits Available.
description: When I attended a Hilton media event in Nashville back in April, some of the most common questions writers asked circled around, “What’s going on with the Small Luxury Hotels partnership?” Back then, we were told to wait. Now, there’s an exciting development. The first Small Luxury Hotels of the World properties have come online with Hilton, and bookings are live.

title: Korean Air and Marriott Bonvoy Partnership Ending — Including Points Transfers
description: Korean Air is notorious for making its SKYPASS miles difficult to earn. Outside of a few co-branded credit cards, flying SkyTeam carriers, or converting Marriott Bonvoy points to SKYPASS miles, there aren’t many meaningful ways to fill your account. And on June 17, 2024, it won’t get any easier. Korean Air is tightening the screws by removing one of the aforementioned earning options. Here’s what you need to know.

tags.name: Korean Air (SkyPass)
tags.description: SkyPass is the loyalty program of Korean Air. Here's what you need to know to earn, redeem, and maximize this lesser-known airline loyalty program currency.

title: Hyatt Enhances Co-Branded Credit Card Earnings at Mr & Mrs Smith Properties
description: World of Hyatt’s partnership with Mr & Mrs Smith has been alive for the better part of two months. Some elements are great; others aren’t so great. Moreover, using a World of Hyatt credit card to pay for your stay wasn’t even that rewarding — until now. Here’s what you need to know about the adjustments to your World of Hyatt card’s earnings on Mr & Mrs Smith stays.

title: Coming Soon to LAX: A Brand-New Chase Sapphire Lounge
description: Only a few days have passed since the last credit card issuer announced plans for a new lounge in a major international airport. That was big news, but we’re here bearing more. This morning, Chase submitted a proposal to build a new outpost coming soon to Los Angeles International Airport (LAX). Chase Sapphire Reserve® cardholders rejoice; you’ll soon have access to the Chase Sapphire Lounge in LAX.

title: Bid United Miles to Win a Flight Simulator Experience
description: Ever wanted to try your hand at flying a commercial plane? United is letting travelers bid on flight simulator experiences using MileagePlus miles. These auctions run through June 24, 2024, and experiences will be held on August 2 and September 27, 2024. Here’s what’s included and how you can place your bid.

title: Download Lufthansa's Miles & More App to Earn 500 Miles
description: At the beginning of February 2023, Lufthansa launched its refreshed Miles & More app to help members book flights and collect Rewards miles. Lufthansa is so invested in having members try out the app that it’s offering 500 bonus miles when members download the app and log in. Here’s a little look into the app and how you can claim 500 bonus miles.

tags.description: Miles and More is the loyalty program of Lufthansa. Here's what you need to know about earning and redeeming this airline loyalty program currency.

title: Three Days Only: Thrifty Traveler 50% Off Premium Subscriptions
description: For just three days, Thrifty Traveler is offering a 50% off flash sale for Thrifty Traveler Premium subscription. From cheap flights to Europe to unicorn-level award availability, Thrifty Traveler Premium alerts you to it all — including by text message if you opt into that option. Here’s more about what you get with Thrifty Traveler Premium and whether its worth it.

title: You Can Now Transfer Choice Privileges Points to Avios (But You Probably Shouldn't)
description: You can now transfer your Choice Privileges points to a trio of Avios programs. The change was introduced without fanfare. But now that you can transfer Choice points to Avios, the question worth asking is: Is it worth it? Let’s dive into the ins and outs of Choice’s new transfer option to see if this is a fair use of your points.

tags.description: AerClub is the loyalty program of Aer Lingus. AerClub members earn Avios, a loyalty currency shared with several other airlines including British Airways.

title: Make a Donation to Miles4Migrants, Get Bonus Aeroplan Points (From 1.33 Cents Apiece)
description: Air Canada and Miles4Migrants launched a campaign that rewards you with Aeroplan points when you donate to Miles4Migrants. You can receive up to 75,000 Aeroplan points as a thank-you for your donation! The campaign will end once the fundraising goal of $250,000 is met, so you’ll want to act quickly if you want to score Aeroplan points for as little as 1.33 cents per point. Here’s what you need to know about Miles4Migrants — and why this promotion is worth your attention.

title: Choice Privileges Devalues Program, Pricing Nights Higher Than Ever Before
description: The Choice Privileges program became a little less valuable today — or whenever it began ignoring its stated points cap on award nights. Choice seems to have devalued its program without notice. Consequently, prices for a free night have already begun creeping upwards. Here’s what you need to know about the Choice Privileges devaluation and why this one stings a little more than most.

title: Score 30 Nights of Hotel Rooms for Just $499 Through Wyndham's New Ultimate Hotel Pass
description: You can unlock a month’s worth of hotel stays for just over $16 per night. For a rate that good, you might assume there’s a catch — and there is. The key to “unlocking” this incredible deal is to pre-register for Wyndham Rewards’ new Ultimate Hotel Pass. With a bit of luck, you can secure one of just 25 minted passes. Here’s what you need to know about the Wyndham Ultimate Hotel Pass and how to pre-register.

tags.description: Stay up to date on the latest limited-time deals and promotions to earn more points and save on travel.

title: [Bug Fixed] LifeMiles Now Charging $1,000+ In Fuel Surcharges on Some Routes
description: LifeMiles is one of our favorite mileage currencies due to excellent award rates, plentiful LifeMiles transfer partners, and no fuel surcharges… at least historically. We found that LifeMiles is charging exceptionally high taxes and fees on some routes. You’ll have to pay over $1,000 in taxes/fees on some routes — even in United economy!

tags.name: Fees & Policies
tags.description: Stretch your points further by understanding the rules, fees, and policies of each loyalty program.

title: Now Open to U.S. Applicants: Match Your Airline Status To Flying Blue
description: Air France–KLM Flying Blue’s status match offer has been out for a long time. And for an equally long time, matches to Flying Blue have been limited to those living in select countries — U.S. residents excluded. Now, that’s changed. If you live in the U.S., you can match your status into the Flying Blue program. Here’s how to match — what it costs and why you should — so you can take advantage of this potentially lucrative offer.

tags.name: Elite Status
tags.description: You don't have to spend a lot of money on travel to get special treatment. Learn how to earn elite status and take full advantage of the benefits.

title: Last Call: Bilt and American Airlines Partnership Ending on June 24
description: We’ve known for quite some time now that Bilt’s partnership with American Airlines would end. The partnership’s final day is coming up quickly, ending on June 24, 2024. In other words, time is running out to initiate a transfer from Bilt to AA, so act soon if you want to convert your Bilt points to AAdvantage® miles.

title: More Escape Lounges Join the Priority Pass Network. Here Are the Locations.
description: Priority Pass and Escape Lounges just extended their partnership. Effective immediately, Priority Pass members can now access 11 Escape Lounges in the United States, in addition to the existing six Escape Lounges in the United Kingdom. Here’s are the new locations, access restrictions, and what Priority Pass members need to know about these lounges.

title: Get a Year of I Prefer Titanium Status for Free With This Promo Code
description: We’ve asked before if you should care about I Prefer Hotel Rewards — the loyalty program of the Preferred Hotels & Resorts hospitality group. In short: Although the program is somewhat niche, it’s worth knowing about if you like upscale properties. Now, with a new elite status offer that anyone can use, there’s an extra incentive to give the program a look. Here’s how to enjoy I Prefer Titanium status for a year — for free.

title: Buy One LifeMiles Award, Get One Free, Plus a 20% Rebate on Flights to Europe
description: Avianca LifeMiles is out with its latest unique promotions, this time offering two-for-one award tickets to select destinations and a 20% mileage rebate on flights to Europe. The list of terms on both promotions are a mile long, and the promotions themselves are sort of quirky. However, it’s worth a look if you want to get a lot of value out of your LifeMiles for travel on Avianca in fall 2024. But you’ll want to act fast. You have until July 4, 2024, to make your reservations. Let’s dive into the details of these Avianca LifeMiles promotions.

title: Last Day to Buy Radisson Rewards Points With a 60% Bonus (0.37¢ Per Point)
description: Today’s the last day to take advantage of a Radisson Rewards buy points promotion offering 60% bonus points through July 4, 2024. While one of the best cost-per-point values we’ve seen from Radisson, finding outsized value after Radisson’s 2022 devaluation will be tough. But it might make sense in a few situations. Here are the details.

tags.name: Buy & Transfer Bonuses
tags.description: Reduce the cost of travel by taking advantage of transfer bonuses and buying points and miles at a discount. Check back often for new deals and promotions.
